title: Ornament
content:
I realize that this is a type ID forum, but I also know that there are many fonts that are actually made up of symbols (ornaments)

Has anyone seen this ornament in a font. I looked at Caslon ornaments and a few others that I own, but cannot find this.

I’m hoping someone recognizes it - or I guess I will need to redraw.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ornament.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052419/http:/typophile.com/files/ornament.jpg) | 5.72 KB |
author: evan

comments.content: yes, that’s a caslon ornament alright. Lanston’s OT version of Caslon has it in there: [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/caslon.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052419/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/caslon.html)
ah, but yours looks like it came from Adobe’s Caslon Pro.
